name: Holy Chicks!
description:
Pitch

Play as Poy & Yop, two chicks representing respectively the shadow and the light having been linked by a curse. 

- Poy's movements affect Yop, and vice versa. Adapt your thinking!

- Collect coins to unlock new levels.

- Collect all the eggs, scattered in some levels... they can be useful! (Spoiler Alert: They are useless in the current version of the prototype)

Prototype

This is a prototype of a concept that is looking to move (or not) towards a final full game if you like the idea. If your feedback is positive, we will be happy to continue with updates!

So don't hesitate to give your opinion in comments.
